OperationDefinition.CAML: <Query> <Where> <Eq> <FieldRef Name="ID"/> <Value Type="Counter">%MapID%</Value> </Eq> </Where> </Query> <ViewFields> <FieldRef Name="ID"/> <FieldRef Name="Title"/> <FieldRef Name="Description"/> <FieldRef Name="HelpMessage"/> </ViewFields> <QueryOptions> <ViewFieldsOnly>True</ViewFieldsOnly> <DatesInUtc>True</DatesInUtc> </QueryOptions>

<!--<Query> <Where> <Eq> <FieldRef Name="Active"/> <Value Type="Bool">1</Value> </Eq> </Where> </Query>--> <ViewFields> <FieldRef Name="ID"/> <FieldRef Name="Title"/> <FieldRef Name="Purpose"/> <FieldRef Name="HelpMessage"/> <FieldRef Name="TemplateLocation"/> <FieldRef Name="HelpFileLocation"/> <FieldRef Name="Stages"/> </ViewFields> <QueryOptions> <ViewFieldsOnly>True</ViewFieldsOnly> <DatesInUtc>True</DatesInUtc> </QueryOptions>

<Query> <Where> <Eq> <FieldRef Name="MapID"/> <Value Type="Text">%MapID%</Value> </Eq> </Where> </Query> <ViewFields> <FieldRef Name="ID"/> <FieldRef Name="Map"/> <FieldRef Name="Stage"/> <FieldRef Name="MapID"/> <FieldRef Name="StageID"/> <FieldRef Name="StagePosition"/> </ViewFields> <QueryOptions> <ViewFieldsOnly>True</ViewFieldsOnly> <DatesInUtc>True</DatesInUtc> </QueryOptions>

<Query> <Where> <Eq> <FieldRef Name="MapID"/> <Value Type="Text">%MapID%</Value> </Eq> </Where> </Query> <ViewFields> <FieldRef Name="ID"/> <FieldRef Name="Tool"/> <FieldRef Name="Stage"/> <FieldRef Name="MapName"/> <FieldRef Name="ToolID"/> <FieldRef Name="MapStageID"/> <FieldRef Name="ToolPosition"/> </ViewFields> <QueryOptions> <ViewFieldsOnly>True</ViewFieldsOnly> <DatesInUtc>True</DatesInUtc> </QueryOptions>

<ViewFields> <FieldRef Name="ID"/> <FieldRef Name="Title"/> <FieldRef Name="MapStageID"/> <FieldRef Name="ToolPosition"/> <FieldRef Name="ToolID"/> <FieldRef Name="Status"/> </ViewFields> <QueryOptions> <ViewFieldsOnly>True</ViewFieldsOnly> <DatesInUtc>True</DatesInUtc> </QueryOptions>

<Query><Where> <And> <Or> <Eq><FieldRef Name="Role"/><Value Type="Text">Team Leader</Value></Eq> <Eq><FieldRef Name="Editor0"/><Value Type="Bool">1</Value></Eq> </Or> <Eq><FieldRef Name="SharePointUser"/><Value Type="User">[me]</Value></Eq> </And> </Where></Query><QueryOptions><DateInUtc>False</DateInUtc></QueryOptions>
